    public class PortableItem
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.

        public void tick(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Location currentLocation)
        Description copied from class: edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
        Inform an Item on the ground of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the item rests upon the ground.
        Overrides:
        tick in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
        Parameters:
        currentLocation - The location of the ground on which we lie.

      • tick

                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
        Description copied from class: edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
        Inform a carried Item of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the Item is being carried.
        Overrides:
        tick in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
        Parameters:
        currentLocation - The location of the actor carrying this Item.
